previouslyApplied.default: Select if you or someone else at your address have previously applied for a loan

previouslyHadIntegrationLoan.default: Select if the loan was granted or not

whoReceivedPreviousLoan.default: Select who was granted the loan

partner.default: Select if you have a partner with you in the UK or not

joint.default: Select if you are applying for a loan together with your partner

dateOfBirth.default: Enter your date of birth in the correct format; for example, 31 3 1980
dateOfBirth.over18: Enter a valid date of birth. You must be over 18 to apply
dateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

brpNumber.default: Enter your BRP number in the correct format; for example, ‘ZU1234567’

niNumber.default: Enter your National Insurance number in the correct format; for example, 'QQ 12 34 56 C'

hasOtherNames.default: Select if you have been known by any other names

homeOfficeReference.default: Enter a Home Office reference number in the correct format; for example, ‘A1234567’ or ‘VPR1234’

partnerBrpNumber.default: Enter your partner's BRP number in the correct format; for example, ‘ZU1234567’

partnerDateOfBirth.default: Enter your partner's date of birth in the correct format; for example, 31 3 1980
partnerDateOfBirth.over18: Enter a valid date of birth. You must be over 18 to apply
partnerDateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

partnerNiNumber.default: Enter your partner's National Insurance number in the correct format; for example, 'QQ 12 34 56 C'

partnerHasOtherNames.default: Select if your partner has been known by any other names

convicted.default: Select if you have ever been convicted of a crime in the UK

detailsOfCrime.maxlength: The details of the crime(s) must be 500 characters or fewer

convictedJoint.default: Select if you or your partner have ever been convicted of a crime in the UK

detailsOfCrimeJoint.maxlength: The details of the crime(s) must be 500 characters or fewer

hasDependants.default: Select if you have any dependants living with you

dependantDateOfBirth.default: Enter dependant's date of birth in the correct format; for example, 31 3 1980
dependantDateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

dependantRelationship.default: Enter the dependant's relationship to you

building.default: Enter details of your building and street

incomeTypes.default: Select options for your monthly income

combinedIncomeTypes.default: Select options for you and your partner's monthly income

salaryAmount.default: Enter total salary amount per month
salaryAmount.min: Salary amount must be greater than zero
salaryAmount.decimal: Salary must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedSalaryAmount.default: Enter total salary amount per month
combinedSalaryAmount.min: Salary amount must be greater than zero
combinedSalaryAmount.decimal: Salary must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

universalCreditAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit amount per month
universalCreditAmount.min: Universal Credit amount must be greater than zero
universalCreditAmount.decimal: Universal Credit must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedUniversalCreditAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit amount per month
combinedUniversalCreditAmount.min: Universal Credit amount must be greater than zero
combinedUniversalCreditAmount.decimal: Universal Credit must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

childBenefitAmount.default: Enter total child benefit amount per month
childBenefitAmount.min: Child benefit amount must be greater than zero
childBenefitAmount.decimal: Child benefit must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedChildBenefitAmount.default: Enter total child benefit amount per month
combinedChildBenefitAmount.min: Child benefit amount must be greater than zero
combinedChildBenefitAmount.decimal: Child benefit must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

housingBenefitAmount.default: Enter total housing benefit amount per month
housingBenefitAmount.min: Housing benefit amount must be greater than zero
housingBenefitAmount.decimal: Housing benefit must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedHousingBenefitAmount.default: Enter total housing benefit amount per month
combinedHousingBenefitAmount.min: Housing benefit amount must be greater than zero
combinedHousingBenefitAmount.decimal: Housing benefit must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

otherIncomeAmount.default: Enter total other income amount per month
otherIncomeAmount.min: Other income amount must be greater than zero
otherIncomeAmount.decimal: Other income must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedOtherIncomeAmount.default: Enter total other income amount per month
combinedOtherIncomeAmount.min: Other income amount must be greater than zero
combinedOtherIncomeAmount.decimal: Other income must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

outgoingTypes.default: Select at least one option for your monthly outgoings

combinedOutgoingTypes.default: Select options for you and your partner's monthly outgoings

rentAmount.default: Enter total rent amount per month
rentAmount.min: Rent amount must be greater than zero
rentAmount.decimal: Rent must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedRentAmount.default: Enter total rent amount per month
combinedRentAmount.min: Rent amount must be greater than zero
combinedRentAmount.decimal: Rent must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

householdBillsAmount.default: Enter total utility bills amount per month
householdBillsAmount.min: Household bills amount must be greater than zero
householdBillsAmount.decimal: Household bills amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedHouseholdBillsAmount.default: Enter total utility bills amount per month
combinedHouseholdBillsAmount.min: Household bills amount must be greater than zero
combinedHouseholdBillsAmount.decimal: Household bills amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

foodToiletriesAndCleaningSuppliesAmount.default: Enter total food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount per month
foodToiletriesAndCleaningSuppliesAmount.min: Food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount must be greater than zero
foodToiletriesAndCleaningSuppliesAmount.decimal: Food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedFoodToiletriesAndCleaningSupplie.default: Enter total food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount per month
combinedFoodToiletriesAndCleaningSupplie.min: Food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount must be greater than zero
combinedFoodToiletriesAndCleaningSupplie.decimal: Food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

mobilePhoneAmount.default: Enter total mobile phone amount per month
mobilePhoneAmount.min: Mobile phone amount must be greater than zero
mobilePhoneAmount.decimal: Mobile phone amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedMobilePhoneAmount.default: Enter total mobile phone amount per month
combinedMobilePhoneAmount.min: Mobile phone amount must be greater than zero
combinedMobilePhoneAmount.decimal: Mobile phone amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

travelAmount.default: Enter total travel amount per month
travelAmount.min: Travel amount must be greater than zero
travelAmount.decimal: Travel amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedTravelAmount.default: Enter total travel amount per month
combinedTravelAmount.min: Travel amount must be greater than zero
combinedTravelAmount.decimal: Travel amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

clothingAndFootwearAmount.default: Enter total clothing and footwear amount per month
clothingAndFootwearAmount.min: Clothing and footwear amount must be greater than zero
clothingAndFootwearAmount.decimal: Clothing and footwear amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedClothingAndFootwearAmount.default: Enter total clothing and footwear amount per month
combinedClothingAndFootwearAmount.min: Clothing and footwear amount must be greater than zero
combinedClothingAndFootwearAmount.decimal: Clothing and footwear amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

universalCreditDeductionsAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit deductions amount per month
universalCreditDeductionsAmount.min: Universal Credit deductions must be greater than zero
universalCreditDeductionsAmount.decimal: Universal Credit deductions must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedUniversalCreditDeductionsAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit deductions amount per month
combinedUniversalCreditDeductionsAmount.min: Universal Credit deductions must be greater than zero
combinedUniversalCreditDeductionsAmount.decimal: Universal Credit deductions must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

otherOutgoingAmount.default: Enter total other outgoings per month
otherOutgoingAmount.min: Other outgoings amount must be greater than zero
otherOutgoingAmount.decimal: Other outgoings amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedOtherOutgoingAmount.default: Enter total other outgoings per month
combinedOtherOutgoingAmount.min: Other outgoings amount must be greater than zero
combinedOtherOutgoingAmount.decimal: Other outgoings amount must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

savings.default: Select if you have any savings

savingsAmount.min: Total amount of savings must be greater than zero
savingsAmount.decimal: Total amount of savings must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

combinedSavings.default: Select if you or your partner have any savings

combinedSavingsAmount.min: Total amount of savings must be greater than zero
combinedSavingsAmount.decimal: Total amount of savings must be in pounds and pence; for example £100.00

amount.between: Enter loan amount between £100.00 and £500.00 in pounds and pence
amount.decimal: Enter loan amount between £100.00 and £500.00 in pounds and pence

jointAmount.between: Enter loan amount between £100.00 and £780.00 in pounds and pence
jointAmount.decimal: Enter loan amount between £100.00 and £780.00 in pounds and pence

purposeTypes.default: Select what you will use the loan for

accountName.default: Enter the name on your account

sortCode.default: Enter your sort code in the correct format; for example 010101

accountNumber.default: Enter your 6 to 8 digit account number

contactTypes.default: Select how we can contact you

likelyToMove.default: Select if you are likely to move to another address in the next 4 weeks

outcomeBuilding.default: Enter details of the building and street

hadHelp.default: Select if you had any help making this application

helpFullName.default: Enter the full name of the person who helped you

helpRelationship.default: Enter the person's relationship to you

helpContactTypes.default: Select how we can contact the person who helped you

helpPhone.default: Enter the person's mobile phone number
